events.message: Hello, I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the product did not meet my expectations.
The system has detected keywords relating to a refund request and has categorized this case accordingly.
An agent has been assigned to handle your refund request and will get back to you shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and reason for the refund so that I can process your request quickly?
My order number is 123456789. The product feels cheap and does not work as advertised, so I want to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund process. You will receive an email with return instructions shortly.
Thanks for the prompt help! I appreciate the quick response and will follow the return instructions you send.
Your refund case has been resolved and the return label has been sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
This is a follow-up to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing the case now as your refund has been successfully processed. Thank you for contacting support.
